content: row at the beak count to the 14th white row position both wings on either side of the body approximately 12 stitches apart sew through the slip_stitch legs flip over magic_ring goose starting from the first white row at the beak count to the 23rd row position both legs so that they are slightly slanted outwards as pictured sew through the slip_stitch congratulations you have completed magic_ring goose @crochetbyghosts 9
